cbinstall.description: A cb fields plugin to allow ajax inline editing for the available cb core field types.

param.name: ajax_profile
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable ajax usage for this field.

param.name: ajax_profile_access
param.label: Access
param.description: Select viewaccesslevel for ajax usage. Note access is still subject to profile edit permissions.

param.name: ajax_placeholder
param.label: Placeholder
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported text to display for empty values.
